info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 01 at 12:15PM CST until January 01 at 12:30PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 PM CST FOR NORTHEASTERN DECATUR COUNTY... At 1215 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Parsons, or 13 miles west of Linden, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Parsons, Decaturville, Mount Tabor, Perryville, Busseltown, Garrett, Jeannette, Hickory Forks, Wilkinstown, Cozette and Bible Hill. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for western Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
